transcript:
Customer: Abe yaar Ranjeet.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji.
Executive: Haan ji sir good evening main Preeti Rathore baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART head office se.
Customer: Ji sir kaise ho aap?
Executive: Thik hu madam.
Executive: Accha actually maine call aapko kiya tha aapka discussion ho raha tha Ranjeet ke sath mein Saloni ke sath mein.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: To kya hua sir aapne bola mera refund kara do service mein adjust kar do matlab kuch kuch aapne bola ki mera ye main samasya hai maximizer mein.
Customer: Ek saal ke andar ek lakh ek nahi ek.
Customer: Ek lakh nahi 1,61,000 ka package liya uske baad mein kya kaam mila mere ko batao kitni lead aayegi aapne mere ko batayi.
Executive: Kya conversion raha sir aapne jo paisa lagaya hai?
Customer: Ek saal se main complaint kar raha hu mera koi result nahi hai uske andar bilkul bhi.
Executive: Ek ek saal mein koi bhi order deliver nahi hue?
Customer: Nahi nahi kuch char char panch panch hazaar ke order dekhe maine.
Customer: Ye mandir ke liye maine premium karwaya tha to kuch hai nahi uska.
Executive: To lekin jo marble wala aapka product line hai na matlab ye jo white marble mein aap deal karte ho marble jaali.
Customer: Maine jo lead liya tha premium maine liya mandir ke liye uske liye jaali ke liye uska puch raha hu aap se main.
Executive: Hmm, ek minute ruko zara.
Customer: Kya naam hai wo.
Customer: Are screen shot zara lena nahi to yaad nahi rahega mere ko.
Customer: Wo naam humne rakh diya.
Executive: Ye jo dono category aapne li hai inka aap bol rahe ho na sir?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Marble jaali aur marble temple ye dono hai na?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ek minute rukiye.
Executive: Pehle aapka profile Kadir ke paas mein tha na?
Customer: Ji haan.
Customer: Uske baad Pallavi ne recharge kiya na unhone Pallavi thik hui wo Pallavi se.
Customer: Kya bol rahe hai sir?
Customer: Pallavi Pallavi karke thik hui.
Executive: Ha ha matlab Pallavi unke paas mein hi thi na Kadir ke paas mein ha.
Customer: Haan unse shuru karwaya tha maine Kadir manager the Pallavi unko report karti thi.
Customer: Main unko sabse bol raha hu main ki yaar mera isme just zero second mein lead ud gayi to kya karu main iska lekin.
Executive: To aap bola aap convince karwa lo usme maximizer ke andar.
Customer: Ab maximizer bola usme koi payment tumhara bacha nahi hai itna bachega payment tumhara.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Maximizer aap logo ko ye karna bola lead wahi milti hai jo premium milti hai.
Customer: Kuch wahi 60,000 milti hai wahi 1,61,000 mein kis liye aap logo ne jhooth bol ke mere ko karwaya ye kaam.
Executive: Sir dekho main aapko batau ki pehla ye ki aapka do category chalta hai marble jaali aur marble temple wala.
Executive: Marble temple mein I have seen ki matlab aapke paas mein calls aa rahi hai matlab agar main data check karu to piche marble temples mein you have got 23 lead ka consumption uske alawa aath aapne call 16 calls li hai aur aapne 18 aath uski direct inquiries li hui hai. Marble jaali mein mujhe aapka jo traffic hai kam dikh raha hai. Isko I can do one thing ki jo bhi category hai jisme thik traffic aa raha hai main usse ek baar check kar leti hu ki agar isko hum change kar sakte hai. Kyunki waise bhi ab refund ka time to bacha nahi hai sir aapka renewal isme generate hone wala hai.
Customer: Main kab se karwa raha hu kab se to fir time bachega kaise madam ye batao mere ko aap. Sir solution to karna chahiye na aap logo ko jhooth nahi bolna chahiye aap ye package mat lo bilkul bhi.
Customer: Main aap logo se kam se kam main 10-12 saal se juda hu 15 saal se aap logo ne convince karke 55 se 60 lakh 60 lakh se 75 75 se 2 lakh 2 lakh se 1 lakh.
Executive: Main aapko ek baat batati hu sir main abhi na aapka past jo discussion hue the Pallavi ke sath mein aur Kadir ke sath mein matlab jo bhi baat chit aapki hui thi.
Customer: Zero second pe lead uda sakte hai mere ko itna batao aap.
Executive: Haan?
Customer: Zero second pe koi lead uda sakta hai kya?
Executive: Sir bilkul zero second mein lead chali jaati hai aisa kuch nahi hai ki lead nahi jaati marble wali.
Customer: Zero second mein lead uda sakte hai zero second mein mera lead uda rahe ho sara sara kaam.
Executive: Uska na main aapko bata rahi hu uska bas ek hi solution hai usme aapko baithna padega lead consume karni padegi matlab aapko active rehna hi padega.
Customer: [inaudible] aadmi ke palak bhi nahi dekh payega apni.
Executive: Sir main aapko complete kar rahi hu ek baar aapka jo kuch product line hoti hai hamare paas mein jo high sold category hai matlab jisme competition.
Executive: Even lead zero second mein bilkul chali jaati hai aapka.
Customer: Zero pe usko sold out main kar raha hu wo mere se nahi hui madam wo.
Executive: Accha.
Executive: Dekhiye to waha pe zero second ka matlab ye nahi hai ki jo bhi supplier hai wo us lead nahi utha pata it is about ki humne competition reduce kiya pehle jaise lead zyada customer utha paate the ab it is restricted to paanch supplier only ki paanch supplier hi lead kharid sakte hai. To paanch supplier mein aisa nahi hai ki aap lead nahi kharid paate kyunki marble temple ki 54 lead 6 mahine mein aap bhi utha paaye ho lekin jab 54 lead aap utha paaye ho to waha pe.
Customer: 15-20 lead agar mere ko mil gayi mere ko wo bhi late night ke andar ya jaldi morning ke andar to wo kuch lead hai kya madam jo timing hoti hai wo hota hai na.
Executive: Dekhiye main aapko ek baat bata rahi hu ki aapne ye bola tha ki sold out to sold out mein aisa hai ki kuch paanch supplier kabhi kisi ke haath mein opportunity lagti hai kabhi kisi ke haath mein opportunity lagti hai to wo opportunity aapko.
Customer: Aap logo ne mere ko batao aapne aapne mere ko special run karwaya mera aapne do category ka to kis liye karwaya aapne?
Executive: Package jo karwaya.
Customer: Jo do aapne do category ka run karwaya na aapne mera special bol ke mera special milega iske andar ye milega wo to uska fayda kya hai to wo maximizer wala wahi use kar raha hai aur wo limited wala bhi kar raha hai.
Executive: Main aapko ek baat batau nahi nahi main aapko ek cheez puchna chahti hu ki aap ye to maante hai ki jo requirement aati hai wo visibility ke basis pe aati hai jo customer upar dikhte hai jo niche dikhte hai uske according traffic divert hota hai. Ab agar aapke paas mein isme jo traffic aa raha hai in category mein jo aa raha hai usme leader itna sara hai matlab leader ka supplier itna sara hai aur star ka supplier itna hai.
Customer: Itna sara hai to mere ko kya karna chahiye mere ko mera paisa.
Executive: Yahi to main aapko wahi to bol rahi hu ki jo abhi aapke paas mein aa raha hai.
Customer: [inaudible] aur kya hoga bas isme kya tumhare paas ye jo hai kuch hai nahi iska aapke paas ye jo hai.
Executive: Main aapko ye bol rahi hu nahi haan sir main aapko ye nahi bol rahi hu.
Customer: Last mein ye bologe kuch nahi hone wala mere baat sunao uske aage aapke paas aapke paas koi jawab nahi hai iske andar.
Executive: Main aapko jawab de rahi hu na sir maine aapko yahi bola ki aapka marble jaali wala jo category hai.
Customer: Aap mere ko ye convince kar rahe ho ki aap 35 ko 61 ke baad mein aapne 60 ka karaya uske baad aapne 75 ka karwaya aapne teen saal ka 2 lakh ka 1 lakh ka karwaya uske baad mein aap.
Executive: Sir dekhiye main aapko ye bol rahi hu ki aapne jo paisa lagaya isme main jo bhi.
Customer: 1,61,000 mein daal raha hu ek saal ka wo pay kar raha hu aapko main to kya matlab hai uska ki mere ko batao aap.
Executive: Haan sir to aisa nahi hai na aapka conversion zero raha hoga aisa to nahi hai.
Customer: Aap logo ko bolna chahiye first time aapko package dete ho bolna chahiye bhaiya aisa nahi milega aapko aisa kaam aisa hoga.
Executive: Aapka kitna conversion raha sir mujhe aap ye batao.
Customer: Wo aap apne manager se pata kijiye madam kitna conversion dega isko.
Executive: Sir conversion to aap mujhe bataoge na kitne order convert hue wo to aap hi bataoge manager kaise batayega customer ko pata hota hai.
Customer: Aapke paas pura pura software copy sari wagera.
Executive: Nahi sir mere paas mein customer ka conversion nahi hota hai ki kitna conversion hua hai kya hua hai.
Customer: Main aapko main aapko party wagera sabke number de dunga pata kar lena kitna conversion hua.
Executive: Aapke paas mein aapka data maintained hoga sir aap mujhe 310 ek baar dijiye kya conversion nikal kar ke aaya.
Customer: Mere ko char panch product message main aapko message de dunga.
Executive: Sir customer data jo order aapke list convert hue honge saal bhar mein wo to honge na aapke paas mein ki humne jo lagaya hai wo paisa hamara nikla hai.
Customer: Madam aapko main wo kya keh raha hu main aapke paas.
Executive: Sir aap mujhe wo bhej dijiye main ek baar wo dekh lungi aur dusra maine aapko bataya ki aapka jo marble jaali hai isko change kara lo kyunki isme mujhe bahut zyada scope nahi dikhta to marble jaali ko we can change. Rahi baat aapka abhi kyunki renewal mein hai teen char mahine to teen char mahine mein you can decide ki haan mujhe kya karna hai renewal time par tab tak aap order isme se conversion aur nikal lijiye.
Customer: Aap renewal to bol diya hoga hi nahi isme aapka aapka payment bacha nahi 30-40 hazaar bacha hua hai usme kuch pata nahi aapka.
Executive: To main wahi to bol rahi hu sir uska ab jab ho hi gaya aapka to renewal generate hone ka time ho gaya hai sir to usme hum kya wo karenge abhi to aap abhi teen char mahine mein.
Customer: Jab aaj hi aap bata rahe ho baad ye baat aap aap mere ko 6 mahine pehle bata sakte the madam ye.
Executive: Kya cheez?
Customer: Ye cheez jo aaj bol rahe ho na aap aapko conversion karwa lo iske andar convert karwa lo uske andar ye aaj ye cheez.
Executive: Nahi to convert karwa main aapko main aapko ye bol rahi hu ki 6 mahine se aap bata raha hu aapko main baad mein ki isme ye samasya aa rahi hai ye problem aa rahi hai sir ye problem aa rahi hai to aapne logo ko us waqt bata dete mere ko aap to usi waqt karwa leta aapne to mera ek saal kharab kar diya uske baad aap bol rahe ho aapka payment bacha nahi hai.
Executive: Nahi sir dekho aisa nahi hai ki humne aapka saal kharab kar diya aap itne saal se IndiaMART se jude hue hai agar aap keh rahe hai.
Customer: Batao sir main is wajah se bilkul fuddu ban gaya bilkul main ye baat to ye hai.
Executive: Nahi sir dekho saat saal aapne chalaya hai na IndiaMART to saat saal mein aapko IndiaMART ne fayda diya hoga tabhi to aap saat saal se jude hue hai sir aur rahi baat ye hai ki maine bola ki.
Customer: 1,75 1 lakh mein teen saal ka aur ek 1,61,000 mein ek saal ka farak hota hai na madam wo zyada.
Executive: Sir dekho farak hota hai nahi lekin agar main aapko ye bol rahi hu ki us abhi current mein kyunki jab supplier badhta hai waha zyada aur leader mein.
Customer: Abhi aap thoda sa discussion chodo kya result hai iske ye batao kuch karna nahi karna iske andar aage mere ko.
Executive: Sir aapko kya karna hai aap mujhe batao na main refund to nahi kar sakti.
Customer: Mera bacha hua business mera agar maximizer mein ho raha hai to mera kar dijiye uske andar wo.
Executive: Chalo thik hai main wo ek baar dekh leti hu hai na haan thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants refund or service adjustment.

- No orders delivered in one year.

- Leads disappear in zero seconds.

- Feels misled about package benefits.



Resolution:

- Executive checked marble temple category traffic.

- Suggested changing marble jaali category.

- Explained zero-second lead disappearance.

- Explained sold-out lead distribution process.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will review maximizer business.

- Customer to send order data.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, subscription, buyleads, maximizer, categories
